entry.data:
CLEAR
PATCHY FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY

LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
